meta.title: Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) - Laguna Beach School District

meta.name: description
meta.content: Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) - Laguna Beach School District

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19), Laguna Beach School District
Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) - Laguna Beach School District
Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) - Laguna Beach School District

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasTwoColumnWideLeftLayout fsSection686 fsHasTheme2

span.strong: [April 1, 2020] After careful deliberation and out of an abundance of caution, school sites are closed to the public and distance learning has been extended until further notice. During this time, LBUSD will continue to provide student lunches on weekdays from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m.

li.span: The District is working closely with state and local agency partners, including the California Department of Education (CDE), California Department of Public Health (CDPH), Orange County Department of Education (OCDE), Orange County Health Care Agency (OCHCA), and the Laguna Beach Fire and Police Departments on a comprehensive response should we need to take additional measures.
To help prevent the spread of illness, we encourage our community, staff, and students to follow these important tips:
Wash your hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds. If soap and water are not available, use an alcohol-based hand sanitizer.
Avoid touching your eyes, nose, and mouth with unwashed hands.
Avoid close contact with people who are sick.
Stay home when you are sick.
Cover your cough or sneeze with a tissue, then throw the tissue in the trash.
Clean and disinfect frequently touched objects and surfaces.

li.a: LBUSD Parent Communication (Comunicación Para Padres de Familia)

h2.a: LBUSD Parent Communication (Comunicación Para Padres de Familia)

p.a: School Closure Update #12: Grading and Assessment During Distance Learning
School Closure Update #8: Extension of Distance Learning
Free Emergency Child care for Eligible Families Children's Home Society of CaliforniA

br.a: Cuidado Infantil Gratis Para Familias Elegibles Children's Home Society of California
Child Care Referrals (Referencias Para Cuidado Infantil)
Child Care Assistance (Asistencia de Cuidado Infantil)
Boys and Girls Club of Central Orange Coast: Child care for Essential Workers
YMCA: Child Care for Essential Workers

p.br: The District will provide lunches to any district student who needs them Monday through Friday from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. All meals will be served at Laguna Beach High School at the side of the campus along St. Ann’s Drive at the cafeteria driveway. Los almuerzos para estudiantes continuarán disponibles de 11 a.m. a 1 p.m. de lunes a viernes. Todas las comidas se servirán en Laguna Beach High School al costado del campus a lo largo de St. Ann's Drive en la entrada de la cafetería.

p.a: Safety, Food, and Housing (Seguridad, comida y vivienda)
Food Resources for Families (Recursos de comida para familias)
CDC's Tips to Keep Children Healthy While School's Out
LBUSD Wellness Resources and Crisis Support
LBUSD Parent Resources for Online Learning
Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Just For Kids: A Comic Exploring The New Coronavirus

li.a: How will LBUSD be keeping families, staff, and students informed regarding Coronavirus? (¿Cómo mantendrá LBUSD informando a las familias, el personal y los estudiantes sobre el coronavirus?)
Specialized Services (Special Education, Counseling, etc.) / Servicios especializados (educación especial, asesoramiento, etc.)

h2.a: How will LBUSD be keeping families, staff, and students informed regarding Coronavirus? (¿Cómo mantendrá LBUSD informando a las familias, el personal y los estudiantes sobre el coronavirus?)

div.p: LBUSD will send messages via ParentSquare to families and staff as new COVID-19 information develops related to schools. In the meantime, families and staff who would like more information on COVID-19 developments in Orange County are encouraged to check the Orange County Health Care Agency (OCHCA) website for the most up-to-date information, as this is a rapidly evolving situation. The District website is updated as new information becomes available.

p.em: LBUSD enviará mensajes a través de ParentSquare a las familias y al personal a medida que se desarrolle nueva información de COVID-19 relacionada con las escuelas. Mientras tanto, se aconseja a las familias y al personal que deseen más información sobre los desarrollos de COVID-19 en el Condado de Orange a consultar el sitio web de la Agencia de Atención Médica del Condado de Orange (OCHCA) para obtener la información más actualizada, ya que esta es una situación que se va desarrollando rápidamente. El sitio web del Distrito se actualiza a medida que hay nueva información disponible.

li.span: We understand that parents have varying levels of comfort with technology use. There are resources below to assist you.
If you are having difficulty with technology, you can contact our technology help desk at helpdesk@lbusd.org.

span.em: Entendemos que los padres tienen diferentes niveles de comodidad con el uso de la tecnología. Hay recursos a continuación para ayudarlo.

em.span: Si tiene dificultades con la tecnología, puede comunicarse con nuestro servicio de asistencia tecnológica en helpdesk@lbusd.org.

h2.a: Specialized Services (Special Education, Counseling, etc.) / Servicios especializados (educación especial, asesoramiento, etc.)

li.span: For students who receive specialized services, such as special education services, counseling, speech therapy, etc., expect communication from the special education department and/or your service providers this week on the provision of such services.
To the extent possible, we will make every attempt to provide some level of service virtually.

span.em: Para los estudiantes que reciben servicios especializados, tales como servicios de educación especial, asesoramiento, terapia del habla, etc., esperen la comunicación del departamento de educación especial y / o sus proveedores de servicios esta semana sobre la provisión de dichos servicios.
En la medida de lo posible, haremos todo lo posible para proporcionar un nivel de servicio virtualmente.

li.span: We understand that families may have limited access to devices such as computers, especially in households with multiple students or that students may have left their chromebooks in their classrooms.
The district has provided mobile devices for students to check out for home use to ensure that district students can continue their learning without interruption
For families that do not have home wireless access or if you are having technical issues, please contact helpdesk@lbusd.org.

span.em: Entendemos que las familias pueden tener acceso limitado a dispositivos como computadoras, especialmente en hogares con varios estudiantes o que los estudiantes pueden haber dejado sus chromebooks en sus aulas.
El distrito ha provisto dispositivos móviles para que los estudiantes puedan usarlos en el hogar para garantizar que los estudiantes del distrito puedan continuar su aprendizaje sin interrupción.
Para familias que no tienen acceso inalámbrico al Internet en el hogar o si tiene problemas técnicos, comuníquese con helpdesk@lbusd.org.

img.alt: Laguna Beach Unified School District Logo

div.div: The Governing Board is committed to providing equal opportunity for all individuals in education. District programs, activities, and practices shall be free from unlawful discrimination, including discrimination against an individual or group based on race, color, ancestry, nationality, national origin, ethnic group identification, age, religion, marital, pregnancy, or parental status, physical or mental disability, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity or expression, or genetic information; a perception of one or more of such characteristics; or association with a person or group with one or more of these actual or perceived characteristics.
